text: anybody knows of a good alternative to OpenBoard?

elements.text: anybody knows of a good alternative to OpenBoard?

text: I searched hard for an alternative. Maybe Figma can come close in terms of what you can do with it. Some of my colleagues use Xournal++.

elements.text: I searched hard for an alternative. Maybe Figma can come close in terms of what you can do with it. Some of my colleagues use Xournal++.

text: Perhaps a tablet with Zoom? Also Remarkable with rMview is great when black/white is good enough.

elements.text: Perhaps a tablet with Zoom? Also Remarkable with rMview is great when black/white is good enough.

text: thanks, will try figma and xournal++

elements.text: thanks, will try figma and xournal++

text: ok figma can't use it, xournal++ looks nice but buggy (I can't scroll in the default zoom mode...)

elements.text: ok figma can't use it, xournal++ looks nice but buggy (I can't scroll in the default zoom mode...)

text: also there's a big of lag when writing
